message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XRV_BANK_STARTDATE
message.locale: The bank branch's start date must not be before the banks start date.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: The branch name field is empty. Please enter a valid branch name.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_FV_SORTCODE_EMPTY
message.locale: The branch sort code field is empty. Please enter a valid branch sort code.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_FV_SORTCODE_OR_BIC_EMPTY
message.locale: BIC or Sort Code must be entered.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XRV_BANK_ENDDATE
message.locale: The bank branch's end date must not be after the banks end date.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XRV_CANCELLED_BANK
message.locale: The branch cannot be inserted as the selected bank is canceled.
The branch cannot be inserted as the selected bank is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XRV_OPEN_ACCOUNTS
message.locale: Start date cannot be modified as this bank branch contains bank accounts created before this date.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_DRE_NAME
message.locale: Failed to insert a new branch. Error inserting the branch name. The name "%1s" already exists on the database.

message.name: ERR_BANK_XFV_BANK_NOT_REGISTERED
message.locale: The bank selected is not a registered bank.
